derivation: or פֹּא; (Job 38:11), or פּוֹ; probably from a primitive inseparable particle 'p' (of demonstrative force) and H1931 (הוּא);
outline:
1. here, from here, hither
    1. here
    2. hither
kjv_def: here, hither, the one (other, this, that) side.
strongs_def: this place (French ici), i.e. here or hence
